pages.text: The $(thing)Drone Condition: Upgrades/$ widget lets you check the number of installed upgrades in this $(l:tools/drone)Drone/$. Specify the upgrade(s) to be checked by using one or more attached $(l:programming/item_filter)Item Filter/$ widgets, set to the upgrade item(s) to be checked; without any filter, all installed upgrades of all types will be counted.
